content.question: Develop an argument that explains whether a two-party system or multiparty systems best enhance the democratization process. Use one or more of the following course concepts in your response: Accountability Legitimacy Stability

frqParts.text: Develop an argument that explains whether a two-party system or multiparty systems best enhance the democratization process. Use one or more of the following course concepts in your response: Accountability Legitimacy Stability

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations
